name: Nolimia
description:
This is a short and pretty unpolished game I made for a 48 Hour Game Jam that one other person participated in. My sister made all of the music, but everything else was me. I plan to keep working on it and hopefully complete what I envisioned before starting and more.

The player controls some guy who I ran out of time to even come up with a name for as is thrust into a destroyed city and defends himself against several Octagon Tanks™. When a tank is clicked, it is set to be damaged in a few seconds and for that duration, the man is unable to move.

There is a built-in timer that you can use for speedrunning if you hate yourself. It starts once the player gains control of the man and can be displayed by pressing T. When the last Octagon Tank™ is defeated, your time is shown on-screen.
